description: This Java class defines a configuration component for storage settings in a Spring Boot application, specifically managing the root directory path for datasets, logs, and artifacts.

classes.name: StorageConfig
classes.description: A Spring Boot configuration class managing storage root directory setting, with default value './storage'.

methods.name: getRoot
methods.description: Returns the storage root directory path.

methods.name: setRoot
methods.description: Sets the storage root directory path.
